titles.title: Help Inspire and Retrain our Exceptional Veterans Act of 2011
HIRE Veterans Act of 2011
To direct the Secretary of Commerce to establish a grant program to provide veterans with apprenticeships and career advice.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Help Inspire and Retrain our Exceptional Veterans Act of 2011 or HIRE Veterans Act of 2011 - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to establish a program to award grants to local chambers of commerce to provide veterans with apprenticeships and career advice. Prohibits more than one grant from being awarded to a local chamber during each five-year period. Provides individual grant amounts of at least $10,000 and not more than $20,000. Terminates the grant program at the end of FY2022. Requires an annual report from the Secretary to Congress after each year of the grant program.
